items.sentence: I have trouble seeing the blackboard from the seat the teacher assigned to me.
Tom stared at the envelope in Mary\'s hand, wondering who the letter was from.
Tom thought it wasn\'t a good idea to leave Mary at home without a babysitter.
A few years ago, on Mother\'s Day, I gave my stepmother a locket as a present.
Tom\'s father comes home once in a while, but he never sticks around for long.
